page.title: 03COMMUNICATIONS(west)
page.content: To the west of this area the number of{unmetalled roads}increases, being used both as access roads to fields or remote farmhouses. There are only {two major roads}in the area; the{A920 (Ellon - Pitmedden) and the{B9005 (Ellon - Methlick). There is a{sparse network of{metalled, single-track roads which provide access to the many small farm communities in the area. The{disused}railway line (Aberdeen to Peterhead, closed in 1978), which runs southwest to northeast through the area is now used by locals for walking and there are plans for the future development of the railway line as a {cycling track.}There is a limited bus service in this area (three daily) which runs along the B9005 to Methlick ,this is the{only}bus service in the area.
